subhead.example: Backups Montoya, Dell to start for Edmonton, San Jose

seoTitle.example: Edmonton Oilers San Jose Sharks game preview

seoDescription.example: Backup goaltender Aaron Dell will make his 19th start of the season when the San Jose Sharks play the Edmonton Oilers at SAP Center on Saturday in the first of back-to-back games.

seoKeywords.example: Game preview, Edmonton Oilers, San Jose Sharks, Aaron Dell, Al Montoya, Feb 10

preview.example:
OILERS (23-26-4) at SHARKS (28-18-8)

10 p.m. ET; NBCSCA, CITY, SN360, SN, NHL.TV

 

The Game

Backup goaltender Aaron Dell will make his 19th start of the season when the San Jose Sharks play the Edmonton Oilers at SAP Center on Saturday in the first of back-to-back games.

blurb.example: EDM@SJS: Goodrow snaps Hansen's pass by Montoya

description.example: Barclay Goodrow takes a drop pass from Jannik Hansen and whips a quick wrist shot past Al Montoya to give the Sharks a 3-0 lead in the 2nd
